Transcript: Liam: [Sighs] I've been up all night. I've been calling Hope. I've been texting. She's not answering. She's not responding.

Brooke: No.

Brooke: I don't know.

Brooke: To tell you the truth, even if I knew, I probably wouldn't tell you.
Liam: Okay. You know what? You're upset with me? Fine! You want to yell at me? You want to lecture me? Go ahead, just do it after --
Brooke: Hope didn't come home last night.
[SCENE_BREAK]
[Knock on door]
Wyatt: I, uh... I searched for a flower that was worthy of you. And this was the closest I could find, so...
Hope: [Chuckles]

Donna: [Chuckles] You should be clearing out your things, not making yourself at home in Eric's office.
Quinn: I guess word hasn't gotten out yet. Hope hired us back. Quinn Artisan Jewelers is here to stay.
Donna: I'm calling security.

Donna: Why don't you just tell me what happened?

Quinn: Bingo.

Quinn: Well, I think that that is Hope's story to tell. But I do know where she is.
Donna: Let me guess -- not at Brooke's.

Quinn: No, she is away... with Wyatt. And they're gonna come back an item and secure our position here. So... you really don't want to get on my bad side. Be nice...respectful... and we should be just fine. Cheers.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Liam: Oh, this is so massively screwed up.
Brooke: [Sighs] So, what happened? What did Hope see between you and Steffy?
Liam: Nothing!
Brooke: She wouldn't just take off because of nothing.
Liam: Okay, well, what did she say to you?

Brooke: Not much. She went down to the cabin, and when she came back, she said she was calling off the wedding. She didn't even say anything about Steffy. You're the one who told me about her. So what was going on between the two of you?

Liam: Talking! We were talking! She had some good news! She -- she had some...incredible news, actually. She... she can have a baby now. She's been getting some treatments, and -- and they've been successful. And that's amazing!

Liam: Uh, it was pretty clear that that wasn't gonna happen.
